activities: As a provider of polling services, Poll Everywhere obtains personal information directly from users who use Poll Everywhere products or services, as well as from business customers (such as conference companies and employers) who purchase Poll Everywhere products and services for use by their employees and other individuals. recoursemech: Consumers may file a complaint concerning Poll Everywhere’s processing of their personal information by emailing security@polleverywhrere.com. If the complaint cannot be resolved through Poll Everywhere’s internal processes, we will cooperate with JAMS pursuant to the JAMS International Mediation Rules, which are accessible on the JAMS website at www.jamsadr.com/rules-international-rules. Poll Everywhere will take steps to remedy any issues arising out of a failure to comply with the Safe Harbor principles.
